overview: Umro Ayyar - A New Beginning[1]  (Pronounced as Ammar Ayaar, Urdu: عمرو عیار) is an upcoming Science fiction movie directed by Azfar Jafari , under the production of VR Chili Production.[2] The film stars Usman Mukhtar, Sanam Saeed, Adnan Siddiqui & Faran Tahir. The film contains extensive VFX effects.[3] The film revolves around the new beginning of Umru Ayyar, who was 80's-90's hero character from the very famous story Hamzanama or Dastaan-e-Amir Hamza. Umro Ayyar was portrayed in the novel as a clever person with a lot of wit, energy & bravery. Umro Ayyar was famous to fight evil entities for fame & money.  The movie is expected to be released in 2022.
title: UmroAyyar-A New Begining
